title: Implement a secure multi-step authentication system
description: As a customer, I want a secure multi-step authentication system, so that I can safely access my account.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The system prompts users for multi-step authentication.
2. Includes password, OTP, optional biometric verification.
test_cases: Given the authentication system is implemented, When a user attempts to login, Then the user is prompted for multi-step authentication.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Design a responsive interface for all devices
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface, so that I can have an optimal experience on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Responsive design, desktops, tablets, mobile devices
acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface adapts fluidly to different devices.
2. The UI is visually intuitive and consistent.
test_cases: Given the responsive interface is designed, When it is accessed on different devices, Then the interface adapts fluidly and consistently.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Develop a dynamic and personalized dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see my relevant information and recommendations.
attributes_and_rules: Dynamic display, customer accounts, tailored recommendations
acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard dynamically displays customer accounts and recommendations.
2. The content is tailored based on user profile attributes.
test_cases: Given the personalized dashboard is developed, When a user logs in, Then the dashboard displays relevant information and recommendations.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Management Architecture
title: Integrate self-service portal with core banking system
description: As a user, I want seamless integration with the core banking system, so that I can access real-time banking services.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal integrates with the core banking system.
2. Real-time synchronization of data is ensured.
test_cases: Given the integration is implemented, When a user performs a banking action, Then the action is synchronized in real-time.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Management Architecture
title: Design a dedicated database for the portal
description: As an administrator, I want a dedicated database for the portal, so that I can ensure performance optimization and reliability.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The database is dedicated to the portal.
2. Performance optimization and reliability are ensured.
test_cases: Given the dedicated database is designed, When the portal handles multiple requests, Then the system performs reliably.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Develop simplified workflows for account openings
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for account openings, so that I can open new accounts easily.
attributes_and_rules: Simplified workflows, automatic form filling, real-time validation
acceptance_criteria:
1. Workflows are simplified for account openings.
2. Automatic form filling and real-time validation are implemented.
test_cases: Given the workflows are developed, When a customer attempts to open a new account, Then the workflow guides the user effectively.

title: Enable secure document upload and management
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely, so that my documents are managed safely for service requests.
attributes_and_rules: Secure upload, validation, encryption, version control
acceptance_criteria:
1. Document upload is secure.
2. Validation, encryption, and version control are implemented.
test_cases: Given the document upload system is enabled, When a customer uploads a document, Then the document is validated, encrypted, and managed securely.

epic_title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notification Engine
title: Implement real-time request tracking and notifications
description: As a customer, I want real-time tracking and notifications, so that I can stay informed about the status of my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time tracking, email/SMS notifications, in-app notification center
acceptance_criteria:
1. Requests are tracked in real-time.
2. Notifications are sent via email/SMS and in-app.
test_cases: Given the notification engine is implemented, When a customer submits a request, Then the customer receives real-time updates.

epic_title: Customer Interaction History and Audit Log Management
title: Maintain an interaction history and audit log
description: As an auditor, I want detailed records of user activities, so that I can ensure visibility and compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Interaction history, audit trail, secure storage, efficient retrieval and filtering
acceptance_criteria:
1. User activities are recorded in detail.
2. Efficient retrieval and filtering of records are supported.
test_cases: Given the interaction history module is implemented, When an auditor reviews activities, Then they can access detailed records efficiently.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and Authorization Framework
title: Implement role-based access control system
description: As an administrator, I want to manage user permissions, so that access is controlled based on roles and authorization levels.
attributes_and_rules: RBAC, permissions management, feature visibility control
acceptance_criteria:
1. RBAC system manages user permissions.
2. Feature visibility is controlled based on roles.
test_cases: Given the RBAC system is implemented, When a user logs in, Then access is managed according to their role and permissions.

title: Implement and monitor data security and compliance
description: As a security officer, I want automated security and compliance monitoring, so that data protection and regulatory standards are maintained.
attributes_and_rules: Data encryption, secure protocols, real-time threat detection, compliance automation
acceptance_criteria:
1. Data security and compliance are automated.
2. Real-time threat detection and secure protocols are in place.
test_cases: Given the security framework is implemented, When data transmission occurs, Then it is encrypted and monitored for threats.
